channel.title: RSCAngel Free Bot
channel.description:
[center]I am not sure if this is legal or not.
[size=14pt][b]AND I WILL DELETE THIS IF IT IS ILLEGAL![/b][/size]
[b][size=14pt]IDEA:[/size][/b] But has anyone ever heard of Rscangel? It's a private 24/7 server dedicated to Runescape Classic.
[b][size=14pt]PLAN:[/size][/b] And there is working bots out, but you also need to pay for them. So I had an idea to find a few old bots and attempt to mess around with a few files and get it to work with RSCAngel server. It worked! So my plan is to get it to work almost flawlessly and for FREE release, or I may just keep it private to a few friends that helped. But anyways, I need a few people to help me edit/create a few other files that I have no idea where to start, and what type of program to use to begin with. We also need to develope a sleeper that will WORK! Which shouldn't be that hard. I still am a beginner to this type of coding language, but I CAN learn fast.
[b][size=14pt]INFO:[/size][/b] And now I somebody(s) to help me decompile some compiled information, and change a few settings. All I really need is somebody to decompile a few files that I will send you. (.Jag, .Mem, etc.) And I could probaly finish the rest from there. And if your interested you can also help with a few other things.
[b][size=14pt]OTHER:[/size][/b] I think I have a great idea going, and it already works great besides the sleeper. I plan on changing the display of everything, name, commands, speed, config, etc. And also, if you switch a few settings around, it will work on any other RSC private server.
[b][size=12pt]Please post or message me on MSN if you are interested.[/size][/b]
[b]MIGHT ADD MORE![/b]
[size=12pt]Here is where the bot will be released at: link is in my signature You must register on the website to download.[/center][/size]

item.title: RSCAngel Free Bot
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

Don’t worry.
I didn’t take any offence to it whatsoever.

Anyway, back ontopic please.

EDIT: The bot and a few scripts is in the website above, you must register in order to download.

And the offer still stands for anyone willing to join me.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCAngel Free Bot
item.dc:creator: @KevinS KevinS
item.description:
@KevinS wrote:

[quote=“nate o, post:8, topic:248521”][quote author=KevinS link=topic=327618.msg2565088#msg2565088 date=1228348547]

Something I will never understand is why people would want to auto on private servers. I mean they are easy enough as it is autoing on a private server is like going out and getting a prostotute and it ending up some dude with a cock. I will never understand your motives on why this gets your blood flowing.

Because its a safe environment to practice writing bots without having to deal with the issue of account bannings or evading detection mechanisms until the time comes to move your bot onto retail servers. Also it lets people see how older bots worked which no longer work on the current system.

And it pisses off private server developers who haven’t put any effort into anticheat mechanisms, and pissing off private server developers is fun.

Well I suppose, I have never thought about testing them on there you have inlitend me.
Ahh I rember the old days were crashing servers was the thing I did for fun XD
[/quote]

And I am not intending on crashing any server.[/quote]
I was not pointing that towards you I was just saying that I used to piss of alot of people by doing that I never ment it to be aginst you.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCAngel Free Bot
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

Original Daniel:

I suggest you get something started before you ask for people to help. Get devs from moparscape, and if you have specific questions then people here will probably answer them if you can show you are making an effort to do it yourself.

Ok, I have a bot that works on RSCAngel private server.
And I am wondering how I can decompile a few files to edit the display, speed, commands, etc.

If you would like, I can upload 1 of the files onto rapidshare or something so you can see what I am talking about.

Sorry if I this hard to read.
It’s hard to put in words really.

So basicly, I am looking for somone to help me develop this bot more.
To create a decent bot for RSCAngel.

And it may seem like a dumb idea, but I am doing this mostly for the experience and as a hobby for now.
And I think I have a lot of learning.

I’ve coded before, and I get the idea on what to edit. But only when the file is decompiled, instead of in byte and any other [][][1]1[][][] language.

I hope that sums a little of it up.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Good luck. I suggest you get started on your own, and ask specific questions here, rather than just asking for people to do it for you - that will get on peoples nerves.

Read full topic
